price: Tunay na sa gayon ay talagang may mga tanda at tunay na Kami noon ay talagang sumusubok.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
